s: November 14, 2023 - Last month, Snap reported a 5% increase in year-over-year revenue for the third quarter following two straight periods of shrinkage. t: Discounted Amazon Prime for qualifying EBT and government assistance recipients
s: Customers who receive eligible government assistance, such as SNAP or Medicaid, or belong to households with income within 150% of the Federal Poverty Guideline are qualified for Prime Access.

t: Snap and Amazon partner on AR shopping in the Snapchat app, initially for eyewear | TechCrunch
s: November 2, 2022 - The new partnership between Amazon Fashion and the social app maker will see brands including Maui Jim, Persol, Oakley, Ray-Ban, Costa Del Mar and others made available for virtual try-on to Snapchat’s 363 million daily active users, the retailer says.

t: Amazon Fresh Groceries - Pay with SNAP EBT
s: The SNAP EBT page enables customers to add their EBT card to their Amazon account while shopping eligible products and discounts. Amazon Fresh accepts SNAP EBT benefits in all eligible regions.
